title: Few issues with my Pixel 3: Screen Flash, Audio Quality, Do not disturb
content:
1) Sometines after pressing the on/off button to check time or turn off screen or to lock the phone the screen flashes brightly.
2) Sometines Audio Quality for outgoing or incoming call is distorted (with WiFi or no WiFi)
3) Sometines when DND is on it changes my setting the behavior and rules by itself (receiving calls, visuals etc..)
